ubuntu.name: Ubuntu
ubuntu.description: Popular Linux distribution based on Debian, known for ease of use and strong community support

kubuntu.name: Kubuntu
kubuntu.description: Ubuntu variant featuring the KDE Plasma desktop environment with modern and intuitive interface

debian.name: Debian
debian.description: Stable and reliable Linux distribution, the foundation for many other distributions

fedora.name: Fedora
fedora.description: Cutting-edge Linux distribution sponsored by Red Hat, featuring latest technologies and innovations

manjaro.name: Manjaro
manjaro.description: User-friendly Arch Linux derivative with rolling release model and excellent hardware support

garuda.name: Garuda Linux
garuda.description: Arch-based distribution with gaming optimizations, beautiful aesthetics, and performance tweaks
